tables.report:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_report` (
  `report_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `category_id` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `about_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `about_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`report_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.report_category:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_report_category` (
  `category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `category_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`category_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.report_general:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_report_general` (
  `general_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`general_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
